body.subject: REMOVING NOTICE
body.message: Dear Ms. Goodheant: We wish to inform you that from May 8, 1995, our office will move to a new location: JT Bldg. 2-1, Toranomon 2-chome, Minato-ku, Tokyo 105 JAPAN. New Telephone number: +81-3-3582-3111. New Facsimile number: +81-3-5572-1439. Additionally, please be advised that our office will be closed from April 29, 1995 to May 7, 1995 due to the move. Yours sincerely, Yoshihiko Ohkawa, Ph.D. Director, Scientific Information Division, Planning Group.
